resources.string: Van Vihar National Park is a national park, but is developed and managed as a modern zoological park.
Bhojtal, formerly known as Upper Lake, is a large lake which lies on the western side of the capital city of Madhya Pradesh, Bhopal.
There are paddle boats given on rent for 30 mins and also a ferry will take you to small island in middle of lake.
Sair Sapata is a tourism and entertainment complex situated on the banks of the Upper Lake in Bhopal.
The Lower Lake or Chhota Talaab is a lake in Bhopal, the capital of Madhya Pradesh state of India. Along with the Upper Lake, it forms the Bhoj Wetland.
Great royal ambiance with live music, best for non-vegetarian.
You cannot resist yourself to sip a cold coffee or enjoy an ever tasty sandwich full of cheez having huge size …whenever you pass by Sagar Gaire.
Fast food corner known for chole khulche.
Italian, Indian, International by Chef AJ.
Impeccable service and reasonable food choice for vegetarians. Try Kameeri, the famous Moghul roti.
Most famous and old food restaurent in bhopal.food quality is good and testy.vairity of foods available there.
The Bhimbetka rock shelters are an archaeological site in central India that spans the prehistoric paleolithic and mesolithic periods.

The Raisen fort is situated at the peek of a hill and has been known for Shiva temple and Mahashivaratri celebrations. A working ancient cannon is also placed on the hill which is used during Ramadan for the announcement of sunset.
The Bhojeshwar Temple has 18 feet Shivalinga which is known as largest Shivalinga in the world built in ancient time. A Jain temple is also built near to the Bhojeshwar Temple.
Striking 19th-century mosque with an ornate white facade offset by a pair of imposing red towers.
The Taj-ul-Masajid or Tāj-ul-Masjid, is a mosque situated in Bhopal, India. It is the largest mosque in India and one of the largest mosques in Asia.
Bharat Bhavan is an autonomous multi-arts complex and museum in Bhopal, India, established and funded by the Government of Madhya Pradesh.The architect of Bhavan is Charles Correa.
A know your army establishment open for all, free of cost. The landscape provides an insight into the nations pride, the indian army, its stories of valor and its achievements.

The Udayagiri Caves are twenty rock-cut caves near Vidisha, Madhya Pradesh from the early years of the 5th century CE. They contain some of the oldest surviving Hindu temples and iconography in India.
One can come here to watch beautiful scenery in the morning or night.
National Museum of Humankind or Museum of Man is an anthropology museum located in Bhopal, India, to present an integrated story of the evolution of man and culture with special reference to India.
